title: Alamogordo Man Sentenced to Federal Prison for Possession of Unregistered Saw-Offed Shotgun (United States Attorney's ...
text: ( Source : United States Attorney's Office for the District of New Mexico ) ALBUQUERQUE - Kenneth Colby Miller , 31, of Alamogordo, N.M. , was sentenced today in federal court in Las Cruces , N.M. , to 30 months in prison followed by three years
